T02D1208:303b-1: badzra g'i ti bha shdyam n'a ma /
T02D1208:303b-3: rdo rje'i glu bshad pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1208:303b-4: bla ma dam pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1208:303b-5: rnal 'byor spyod pa dpyod pa snying po'i 'bras gsol 'jig rten gsum mgon mnga' bdag dang //
T02D1208:303b-6: gnas dang zhing la bzhugs pa'i yon tan phung po dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma //
T02D1208:304a-0: rdo rje slob dpon bla chen yon tan gter @304a * //
T02D1208:304a-1: gyur 'khor ba'i pha rol son pa la //
T02D1208:304a-2: phyag 'tshal glu yi khyad par snyed dkar brjod pa bdag gi don phyir bri bar bya //
T02D1208:304a-3: kolla aa retthi aa bo l'a zhes bya ba ni
T02D1208:304a-4: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas ma lus par bstan pa'o
T02D1208:304a-5: // mummu ni re kakko l'a zhes bya ba ni
T02D1208:304a-6: zhing dang nye ba'i zhing ma lus par bstan pa'o
T02D1208:304a-7: // // gha ni kri pi t'a ho b'adzdza ai /
T02D1208:304a-8: k'a ru ne ki aa ai na ro l'a zhes
T02D1208:304a-9: bya ba ni tstshando ha ma lus par bstan pa'o
T02D1208:304a-10: // ta him ba la kh'adzdza ai /
T02D1208:304a-11: g'a dhem ma aa na b'adzdzi aa ai zhes bya
T02D1208:304a-12: ba ni nye ba'i tstshando ha ma lus par bstan
T02D1208:304a-13: pa'o // ha le ka linydza ra pa ni aa ai /
T02D1208:304a-14: du dhu ra b'adzdzi aa ai zhes bya ba ni 'du ba ma lus par bstan pa'o //
T02D1208:304a-15: tsa au sa ma katstshu ri sihl'a /
T02D1208:304a-16: kapp'u ra l'a ai aa ai zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i 'du ba ma lus par bstan pa'o //
T02D1208:304a-17: ma l'a aindha nam sh'a lim dza ta him bha
T02D1208:304a-18: ru kha ai aa ai zhes bya ba ni dur
T02D1208:304a-19: khrod ma lus par bstan pa'o //
T02D1208:304a-20: ni ram shu aang+ga tsa da wi ta him dza
T02D1208:304a-21: s'a ra ba pa ni aa ai zhes bya ba
T02D1208:304a-22: ni nye ba'i dur khrod ma lus par bstan pa'o
T02D1208:304a-23: // phrem kha na khet ka rante shuddh'a shuddha nna ma ni aa /
T02D1208:304a-24: ai zhes bya ba ni 'thung gcod ma lus par bstan pa'o //
T02D1208:304a-25: ma la a'am tse kundu ru ba da ai dindi
T02D1208:304a-26: ma ta hinna b'adzdza aa ai zhes bya ba ni
T02D1208:304a-27: nye ba'i 'thung gcod ma lus par bstan pa'o //
T02D1208:304a-28: 'di ni glu'i rim pas gnas la sogs pa bsdus pa'o //
T02D1208:304a-29: phyogs gzhan yang nye bar bshad pa yod de /
T02D1208:304a-30: kolla ae retthe aa bo lnga zhes bya ba la /
T02D1208:304a-31: ko zhes bya ba ni sku'i rdo rje'o //
T02D1208:304a-32: la zhes bya ba ni gsung gi rdo rje'o //
T02D1208:304a-33: re zhes bya ba ni thugs kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D1208:304a-34: tthi aa zhes bya ba ni bo lar gnas pa'o //
T02D1208:304a-35: mummu ni re kakko la zhes bya ba mu zhes bya ba ni ro ma'o //
T02D1208:304a-36: mmu zhes bya ba ni brkyang ma'o //
T02D1208:304a-37: ni zhes bya ba ni kun 'dar ma'o //
T02D1208:304a-38: re zhes bya ba ni rtsa gsum gsal bar byed pa'o ;
T02D1208:304a-39: / kakko la ni de rnams kyi gnas pa'i gnas so //
T02D1208:304a-40: gha ne kri pit ho b'adzdza ai zhes bya ba
T02D1208:304a-41: ni rtsa gsum po rnams su rdo rje gsum mnyam
T02D1208:304a-42: par 'jug pa'o // k'a ru ne ki aa ai
T02D1208:304a-43: na ro l'a zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gsum
T02D1208:304a-44: mnyam par gzhug pa las kun 'dar gyi rtsa las
T02D1208:304b-1: ta him ba la kh'adzdza ai //
T02D1208:304b-2: g'a dhem ma aa na pidzdza aa ai zhes bya
T02D1208:304b-3: ba ni der ni byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba
T02D1208:304b-5: ma da nam yang btung ba ste /
T02D1208:304b-6: shin tu 'byung ba ni 'di ni bsdams pa'i don to //
T02D1208:304b-7: ha le k'a linydza ra pa ni aa ai /
T02D1208:304b-8: dum dhu ra badzdza aa ai //
T02D1208:304b-9: zhes bya ba la ha le zhes bya ba la bod pa'o //
T02D1208:304b-10: k'a linydza ra pa ni skal ba dang ldan pa ste /
T02D1208:304b-12: dum dhu ra ni skal ba dang mi ldan pa ste /
T02D1208:304b-13: de nyid spang bar bya ste /
T02D1208:304b-15: tsa au sa ma ka tstshu ri sihl'a //
T02D1208:304b-16: kapp'u ra l'a ai aa ai /
T02D1208:304b-17: zhes bya ba ni bshad pa dang gci ba dang
T02D1208:304b-18: me tog dang sa bon bzhi'i rdzas kyis dril ba
T02D1208:304b-19: dang / bza' bar yang byed de /
T02D1208:304b-20: der ni dus la rang gi sems rangs pa'i don
T02D1208:304b-21: dang bdag nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa gzhom pa'i
T02D1208:304b-22: don te / go cha dam pa yin no //
T02D1208:304b-23: ma la aindha na sh'a linydza ta him bha ru
T02D1208:304b-24: kh'a ai aa ai zhes bya ba la m'a la
T02D1208:304b-26: sh'a lim dzdza zhes bya ba ni sha chen no //
T02D1208:304b-27: ta him zhes bya ba ni dus der ro //
T02D1208:304b-28: bha ru kh'a ai aa ai zhes bya ba ni rim par sbyar bar shes nas za ba'o //
T02D1208:304b-29: phrem kha na khe ta ka rante shuddha aa shuddha na mu ni aa ai zhes bya ba la /
T02D1208:304b-30: phreng zhes bya ba la gnas las skyes pa dang /
T02D1208:304b-32: ming las skyes pa rnams kyi dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma de rnams kyis 'dus pa'o //
T02D1208:304b-33: khe ta ka rante zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo
T02D1208:304b-34: dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma de rnams kyi rang
T02D1208:304b-35: gi 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gcig pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1208:304b-36: no // shuddha aa shuddha nan mu ni aa ai zhes bya ba ni dus der bgrod pa dang /
T02D1208:304b-38: bza' ba dang mi bza' ba dang btung ba dang mi btung bar mi brtag ste /
T02D1208:304b-39: gnas der gang kha cig gdol pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1208:304b-41: rigs las skyes pa ngan pa'i bud med dam /
T02D1208:304b-42: skyes pa de rnams thams cad rang 'dod pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor gyis mchod par bya ste /
T02D1208:304b-43: 'di'i dngos po smad par mi bya'o //
T02D1208:304b-44: ni r'am shu aadge tsa d'a bi aa ai /
T02D1208:305a-0: ta him dza s'a ra w'a pa ni aa ai zhes bya ba ni sgrub @305a * //
T02D1208:305a-1: pa pos rang bzhin med pas rnam par rtog pa
T02D1208:305a-2: thams cad dang yid gnyis med pas bdag nyid dpal
T02D1208:305a-3: he ru ka'i nga rgyal byas te /
T02D1208:305a-4: mchod pa chen po'i don gyi phyir rang gi sems
T02D1208:305a-5: rangs bas dur khrod dam g-yul gyis las skyon med
T02D1208:305a-7: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma la phyag 'tshal te /
T02D1208:305a-8: 'dus pa de la dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1208:305a-9: ma la aa dze kundu ru ba ta ai /
T02D1208:305a-10: dindi ma ta hinna b'adzdzi aa ai zhes bya ba
T02D1208:305a-11: ni de la 'dus pa chen po'i dus su dpa'
T02D1208:305a-12: bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas b'a la zos
T02D1208:305a-13: pa dang ma ngan 'thungs pas yid dga' ba rnams
T02D1208:305a-14: sgrub pa po la shin tu 'dod cing snying la
T02D1208:305a-16: bsod nams byas pa'i sgrub pa po rjes su gzung
T02D1208:305a-17: ba'i rgyus rangs pa'i bsam pas gdol pa la sogs
T02D1208:305a-18: pa'i rigs las skyes pa'i shin tu ngan pa skyug
T02D1208:305a-19: bro ba'i lus de nyid sgrub pa pos rang pa
T02D1208:305a-20: chen po dang / bsam pa dri ma med pas
T02D1208:305a-21: dpal he ru ka'i nga rgyal byas pas dam tshig
T02D1208:305a-22: bdag med ma'i gzugs su rab tu brtag pa mchod
T02D1208:305a-23: par bya zhing spangs par mi bya'o //
T02D1208:305a-24: 'di ni glu'i man ngag gi don nyung ngu'o //
T02D1208:305a-25: kolla ai retthi aa bo l'a /
T02D1208:305a-26: mummu ni re kakko l'a zhes bya ba la kolla ai re zhes bya ba ni thabs so //
T02D1208:305a-27: gnas pa zhes bya ba ni 'di'o //
T02D1208:305a-28: de ltar thabs ni ko l'a zhes bya ba brjod do //
T02D1208:305a-29: mummu ni zhes shes rab kyi rang bzhin gyis shes
T02D1208:305a-30: rab kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas kakko la zhes brjod
T02D1208:305a-31: do // yang na ko zhes bya ba ni kapp'ur ro //
T02D1208:305a-32: lla zhes bya ba ni thim pa'o //
T02D1208:305a-33: kapp'u ra de'i thim pa ni ma la bar brjod do //
T02D1208:305a-34: ao zhes bya ba ni thabs kyi tshig ste /
T02D1208:305a-35: rtsa gsum bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1208:305a-36: gi ri zhes bya ba mgo bo'i gnas so //
T02D1208:305a-37: mgo bo de nyid na thod pa brgyad dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1208:305a-38: ri yang rva brgyad kyis nye bar brgyan pa'o //
T02D1208:305a-39: ri'ang sna tshogs du ma'i su las rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag go //
T02D1208:305a-40: mgo bo de nyid rtsa gsum cu rtsa gnyis rnams nyin mtshan du rgyun mi 'chad par 'dzag go //
T02D1208:305a-41: ri ni phyi rol dang bcas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ba'o //
T02D1208:305b-0: mgo @305b bo de nyid byang chub kyi sems la
T02D1208:305b-1: sogs pa rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pas
T02D1208:305b-2: brgyan pa'o // 'di nyid kyi phyir ni lha thams cad kyi gnas so //
T02D1208:305b-3: mgo bo yang lha'i gnas so //
T02D1208:305b-4: lus la yang dag par yod pa'i don 'di ni lha zhes brjod pa ste /
T02D1208:305b-5: 'di nyid kyi phyir lha thams cad kyi bdag nyid rang bzhin ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1208:305b-6: rigs pa 'dis mgo bo gi ri zhes bya bar brjod do //
T02D1208:305b-7: ba zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1208:305b-8: ao zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'dren pa'o //
T02D1208:305b-9: la zhes bya ba ni rgyan 'byung ba'o //
T02D1208:305b-10: gnas pa zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i lte bar gnas pa'o //
T02D1208:305b-11: aa zhes bya ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1208:305b-12: mu zhes bya ba ni yan lag thams cad do //
T02D1208:305b-13: mmu zhes bya ba ni padma 'dab ma brgyad ze ba dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1208:305b-14: na zhes bya ba ni padma'i lte ba de nyid
T02D1208:305b-15: la kun 'dar gyi rtsa shin tu mi dmigs pa'i
T02D1208:305b-16: gzugs can ma'o // ro zhes bya ba ni de'i gsal ba dang 'byed pa'o //
T02D1208:305b-17: ka zhes bya ba ni bde ba'o //
T02D1208:305b-18: kko zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'o //
T02D1208:305b-19: la zhes bya ba ni rgyan khu bar gyur pa phyung ba'o //
T02D1208:305b-20: aa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1208:305b-21: gha ne kri pi ta ho b'adzdza ai zhes bya ba ni gha na zhes bya ba rdo rje'o //
T02D1208:305b-22: kri pi ta zhes bya ba padma'o //
T02D1208:305b-23: ho zhes bya ba ni cha rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi de kho na'o //
T02D1208:305b-24: b'adzdza ai zhes bya ba ni kundu ru shin tu
T02D1208:305b-25: mngon par chags pas rdo rje dang padma rdebs pa'i
T02D1208:305b-26: sgra'o // k'a ru ne ki aa ai na ro
T02D1208:305b-27: l'a zhes bya ba ni kundu ru ni mchog tu
T02D1208:305b-28: sgra'o // dga' ba ste / de nyid kyi kundu
T02D1208:305b-29: du'i dus su mchog tu dga' ba skye ba'i dus
T02D1208:305b-32: g-yul du ha dang si la sogs pa gang byas pa de nyid rol zhes brjod do //
T02D1208:305b-33: ta him ba la kh'adzdza a'i /
T02D1208:305b-34: g'a dhem ma aa na b'adzdzi aa ai zhes bya
T02D1208:305b-35: ba la ta him ni g-yul gyi dus der ma
T02D1208:305b-36: mchu bza' bar bya ba dang /
T02D1208:305b-37: bde ba la shin tu mngon par chags pas 'o'i
T02D1208:305b-38: rnam par dgod pa'i sbyor bas ma mchu'i sbyor bas
T02D1208:305b-39: yang dag par 'dzag pa'i btung bar bya ba ste
T02D1208:305b-40: / sbyor ba 'dis b'a la bza' ba dang ma
T02D1208:305b-41: da na btung ba zhes bya ba ni dngos po'o
T02D1208:306a-0: / // ha le k'a linydza ra pa ni aa @306a * //
T02D1208:306a-2: dum dhu ra b'adzdza aa ai zhes bya ba la ha le zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
T02D1208:306a-3: k'a linydza ra zhes bya ba ni skal ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1208:306a-4: pa ni aa ai zhes bya ba ni der skal ba bzang po gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1208:306a-5: yang na ha zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1208:306a-6: la zhes bya ba ni rtse ba ste kundu ru byed pa'o ;
T02D1208:306a-7: / ai zhes bya ba ni padma'o //
T02D1208:306a-8: yang k'a linydza ra zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa
T02D1208:306a-9: po yang pi tsu'i nga rgyal gyis rnal 'byor dang
T02D1208:306a-10: ldan pa dang / rig ma bdag med ma'i gzugs
T02D1208:306a-11: can mar rdzogs nas kundu ru'i dus su sgrub pa
T02D1208:306a-12: po'i dbang pos snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D1208:306a-13: h'um gi sa bon bsam par bya'o //
T02D1208:306a-14: bsams nas 'od zer kha dog nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pa phyung ste /
T02D1208:306a-15: nam mkha'i dkyil du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal he
T02D1208:306a-16: ru ka la sogs pa gtso bo rnams spyan drangs
T02D1208:306a-17: nas / rang gi lus la bcug ste /
T02D1208:306a-18: byang chub kyi sems ni rnam par spros nas rdo
T02D1208:306a-19: rje'i lam gyis rig ma'i chu skyes su bsam par
T02D1208:306a-20: bya'o // gnyis gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba'i dag pa
T02D1208:306a-21: la sems rangs pa byung na lha'i rnam par spro
T02D1208:306a-22: zhing bde ba'i gzugs kyis bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1208:306a-23: k'a linydza ra gzhug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1208:306a-24: yang na ka zhes bya ba ni ga bur ro //
T02D1208:306a-25: li zhes bya ba ni legs par byed pas rdo rje dang chu skyes kyi sbyor ba'o //
T02D1208:306a-26: dza zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang chu skyes sbyor ba des skyed par byed pa dang /
T02D1208:306a-28: yang na byang chub kyi sems de nyid kyis khams
T02D1208:306a-29: gsum bskyed pa dang ji srid du gnas pa dang
T02D1208:306a-30: / g-yo ba dang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
T02D1208:306a-31: byang chub sems dpa' rnams skyed par byed pa ni dza zhes bya'o //
T02D1208:306a-32: re pha zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags chen po'i rjes su chags pa las /
T02D1208:306a-33: sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed de /
T02D1208:306a-34: gang gi phyir 'dod chags chen po las byung ba de'i phyir k'a linydza rab brjod do //
T02D1208:306a-35: sbyor ba 'dis mchog tu dga' ba mdzes pa las
T02D1208:306a-36: de ma thag tu 'khor ba'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D1208:306a-37: bde ba chen po'i gzugs can rigs kyi bdag po'i
T02D1208:306b-0: khar gsal bar mi gnas pa dang ma @306b byung
T02D1208:306b-1: ba'i dus na ji srid du 'jig rten gsum dang
T02D1208:306b-2: khams gsum dang / gnas pa dang g-yo ba'i rnam
T02D1208:306b-3: pa'i chos thams cad rtag tu ro gcig pa'i rang
T02D1208:306b-4: bzhin gyis dus der zhugs pa dang nang du phyin
T02D1208:306b-5: khams gsum dang / pa dang / rang bzhin gang
T02D1208:306b-6: zhig thim par gyur pa zhes bya ba de nyid
T02D1208:306b-7: ka linydza ra gzhug pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1208:306b-8: du dhu ra zhes bya ba'i du zhes bya ba ni gti mug go //
T02D1208:306b-9: dhu zhes bya ba ni zhe sdang ngo //
T02D1208:306b-10: ra zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags so //
T02D1208:306b-11: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gtso bo rnams dang /
T02D1208:306b-12: nyon mongs pa ma lus par bgrang pa yongs su
T02D1208:306b-13: gsal zhing spang ba ni btang snyoms kyi dngos po
T02D1208:306b-14: zhes bya'o // ka ni 'dod pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1208:306b-15: thu ni 'dod pa'i gzhir brjod do //
T02D1208:306b-16: ra ni cung zad 'tshod pa ste /
T02D1208:306b-17: dga' ba ni ka thu rir brjod do //
T02D1208:306b-18: si nam bde bar brjod do //
T02D1208:306b-19: hl'a ni dga' bar byed pa po ste ;
T02D1208:306b-20: sems kyi rangs pas chen po ni dam pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1208:306b-21: tsa ni bha ga zhes brjod do //
T02D1208:306b-22: au ni gsal bar byed par brjod do //
T02D1208:306b-23: sa ni gdong mnyam por shes par bya'o //
T02D1208:306b-24: ma ni 'du ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1208:306b-25: ka ni khu ba'i gzugs so //
T02D1208:306b-26: pp'u ni padma skyes zhes brjod ;
T02D1208:306b-27: / ra ni padmar dga' ba ste //
T02D1208:306b-28: kapp'u ra ni dga' bral zhes brjod do //
T02D1208:306b-29: k'a linydza rar gzhug pa'i dus der don dam pa
T02D1208:306b-30: byang chub kyi sems kyi rang bzhin 'byung ba dga'
T02D1208:306b-31: ba bzhi'i rang bzhin gyis gang bstan gtad pa dam
T02D1208:306b-32: tshig gzhi'i rtse brjod pa de bstan to //
T02D1208:306b-33: ma la aindha nam sh'a lim dza /
T02D1208:306b-34: ta him bha ru kha au aa ai zhes bya ba la ma zhes bya ba ni mgo bo'o //
T02D1208:306b-35: la zhes bya ba ni bcom pa'i gnas so //
T02D1208:306b-36: aindha nam zhes bya ba ni gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1208:306b-37: shu ni zhes bya ba ni bde ba ste /
T02D1208:306b-39: lim zhes bya ba ni 'dzag pa'o //
T02D1208:306b-40: ta him zhes bya ba ni skad cig bzhi'i dus der ro //
T02D1208:306b-41: bha ru zhes bya ba ni rgyun de nyid mtshan du'o //
T02D1208:306b-42: kh'a ai aa ai zhes bya ba ni ma chad par bde ba myang ba dmigs pa'o //
T02D1208:306b-43: yang na dus rer byang chub kyi sems rnam par bor ba de nyid bza' bar bya ba dang /
T02D1208:307a-1: spang bar mi bya ba zhes bya ba'i dngos po'o //
T02D1208:307a-2: pa zhes bya ba ni padma snying po dang /
T02D1208:307a-4: ae zhes bya ba ni ae'i cha byad do //
T02D1208:307a-5: ra zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i cha byad de padma gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1208:307a-6: kha zhes bya ba ni mkha' 'gro'i gdong phye ba
T02D1208:307a-7: ste kun 'dar gyi rtsa phye ba zhes bya ba'i
T02D1208:307a-8: dngos po'o // na zhes bya ba ni byang chub
T02D1208:307a-9: kyi sems kyi thig le'i rang bzhin bde ba rdo
T02D1208:307a-10: rje dang padma'i rtse mor gsal bar gnas pa'o //
T02D1208:307a-11: khe ta ka rante zhes bya ba ni rdo rje
T02D1208:307a-12: dang chu skyes gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor bas thig le
T02D1208:307a-13: gnyis 'du ba gnyis med par byed pa zhes bya
T02D1208:307a-14: ba'i dngos po'o // shuddh'a shuddha na mu ni ai
T02D1208:307a-15: zhes bya ba ni thig le gnyis gnyis su med
T02D1208:307a-16: par 'gyur ba'i bde ba bzang po'i dus der dngos
T02D1208:307a-17: po dang dngos po med pa dang /
T02D1208:307a-18: bdag dang bdag gi dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1208:307a-19: ma ni aa ai zhes bya ba ni mi 'dod do zhes bya ba'i dngos po'o //
T02D1208:307a-20: ni r'am shu aam ge tsa d'a bi aa ai
T02D1208:307a-21: zhes bya ba la ni r'am shu zhes bya ba
T02D1208:307a-22: ni sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin gyi phyag rgya ste
T02D1208:307a-27: don yod kyi mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1208:307a-28: aang+ga tsa da bi zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs 'dis phung po lnga'i nga rgyal bya'o //
T02D1208:307a-29: ta him zhes bya ba ni gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'i dus der ro //
T02D1208:307a-30: dza zhes bya ba ni ji tsam gnas pa dang g-yo ba'i chos thams cad do //
T02D1208:307a-31: sa zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1208:307a-32: rva zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'o //
T02D1208:307a-33: ba zhes bya ba ni bag chags gnyis kyis zin pa'i sems kyi 'khor ba rnams so //
T02D1208:307a-34: de ni lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas yang dag
T02D1208:307a-35: par sbyangs pa g-yo ba dang gnas pa thams cad
T02D1208:307a-36: kyi rang bzhin gcig tu 'byung ba'i sbyor bas btang
T02D1208:307a-37: ba'i sgom par byed pa gang zhig gi rang bzhin
T02D1208:307a-38: de gzhug pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po'o //
T02D1208:307a-39: ma la aa dze kundu ru ba d'a ai /
T02D1208:307a-40: dindi ma ta hi nam b'adzdza aa ai zhes bya ba la /
T02D1208:307a-41: ma la aa dze zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo
T02D1208:307b-0: dang dpa' mo'i @307b dbang phyug ma thams cad 'du
T02D1208:307b-1: ba'o // dpa' bo thams cad kyi sgras ni rtag
T02D1208:307b-2: pa la sogs pa 'khor los sgyur ba drug go
T02D1208:307b-3: ba'o // // dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma thams cad
T02D1208:307b-4: kyi sgras ni gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs
T02D1208:307b-5: pa'i 'khor los sgyur ma drug go //
T02D1208:307b-6: ji srid du rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i dpa'
T02D1208:307b-7: bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma de'i bdag nyid
T02D1208:307b-8: las skyes pa dpa' bo de rnams thams cad sgrub
T02D1208:307b-9: pa pos rang gi lus kyi nang du bsgom mo
T02D1208:307b-10: // gang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma de rnams thams cad de nyid kyi nang du bsgom mo //
T02D1208:307b-11: sbyor ba 'dis sgrub pa po'i dbang pos rang dang
T02D1208:307b-12: 'dra ba dang lhan cig mnyam par sbyor bar byed
T02D1208:307b-13: pa'i sgom pa ni ma la aa dze zhes bya
T02D1208:307b-14: ba'i dngos po'o // rdo rje dang padma mnyam par
T02D1208:307b-15: gzhug par byed pa'i sgom pa ni kundu ru yin
T02D1208:307b-16: no zhes bya ba'i dngos po'o //
T02D1208:307b-17: dindi ma zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1208:307b-18: gzugs can gyi byang chub sems ma reg pa'i phyir
T02D1208:307b-19: dindi ma'o // lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can byang
T02D1208:307b-20: chub kyi gzugs kyang reg par byed pa dka' ba
T02D1208:307b-21: rang rig pa tsam gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las
T02D1208:307b-22: dindi ma'o // 'das pa ste / rgyu 'dis don
T02D1208:307b-23: dam pa byang chub kyi sems dindi ma zhes brjod
T02D1208:307b-24: dindi ma'o // 'das pa ste / do // ta
T02D1208:307b-25: him zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes pa 'byung
T02D1208:307b-26: ba'i dus der byang chub kyi sems ji ltar nus
T02D1208:307b-27: pa gzung ba dang mi spang ba zhes bya ba'i
T02D1208:307b-28: dindi ma'o // 'das pa ste / do // don
T02D1208:307b-29: to // 'di ni pi tsu rdo rje'i rgyud las
T02D1208:307b-30: gsungs pa glu'i mchog rnyed par dga' ba gsang ba
T02D1208:307b-31: chen po'i shin tu gsang ba'i don bzang po'i don
T02D1208:307b-32: yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir dang /
T02D1208:307b-33: the tshom bsal ba'i phyir rnal 'byor ma'i gtso mo
T02D1208:307b-34: bdag med mas 'dod chags chen po'i rjes su chags
T02D1208:307b-35: pas rdo rje mchod pas yang dag par mchod pa'i
T02D1208:307b-36: dus su bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang /
T02D1208:307b-37: shin tu dgyes pa thugs kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams
T02D1208:307b-38: kyis rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gang gsungs pa glu'i
T02D1208:307b-39: rgyal po mchog gsungs pa'i snyems pa med pa'i don
T02D1208:307b-41: / de nas gar bshad pa brjod do //
T02D1208:308a-0: he ru ka yi gzugs kyi @308a * //
T02D1208:308a-2: / chags bral mi gos sems kyis ni //
T02D1208:308a-3: 'dod chags sems kyis bsgom pa nyid //
T02D1208:308a-4: shr'i ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te //
T02D1208:308a-5: stong pa dang snying rje gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te //
T02D1208:308a-6: stong pa dang snying rje gnyis su med pa'i sbyor
T02D1208:308a-7: bas byang chub kyi sems gang byung ba de nyid
T02D1208:308a-8: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1208:308a-9: he zhes bya ba ni rgyu la sogs pas stong pa ste /
T02D1208:308a-10: he zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1208:308a-11: ae zhes bya ba ni padma ste /
T02D1208:308a-12: rdo rje dang padmar rgyur gyur pa des bde ba
T02D1208:308a-13: gang 'byung bas rtog pa med pa de nyid rgyu
T02D1208:308a-15: ru zhes bya ba ni tshogs pa dang bral ba ste /
T02D1208:308a-16: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D1208:308a-17: ka zhes bya ba ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa ste /
T02D1208:308a-18: rab tu bcug pa dang bral bar gyur pa ni rnam par grol ba nyid de /
T02D1208:308a-19: chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyis thams cad kyi na bdag nyid la gnas so //
T02D1208:308a-20: 'di ni gang du yang mi gnas pa'o //
T02D1208:308a-21: dpal he ru ka'i rang bzhin 'dis rgyu bas gar zhes bya'o //
T02D1208:308a-22: dpal he ru ka'i gzugs kyis sems kyi dran pa
T02D1208:308a-23: mi phyed pa rnyog pa med pa 'dis ni rnal
T02D1208:308a-24: 'byor dran pa mi 'phrogs pa las zhes bya ba'i
T02D1208:308a-25: don to // sgom pa 'dis ni 'dod chags kyi sems te /
T02D1208:308a-26: chags pa dang bral ba ma yin pa'i sems kyis so //
T02D1208:308a-27: rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1208:308a-28: rnal 'byor ma dang ma mo yis //
T02D1208:308a-29: 'di dag gis dpal he ru ka'i gzugs kolla gi
T02D1208:308a-30: rir bzhugs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i glu
T02D1208:308a-31: dang gar dag gis nges par glu blang ba dang
T02D1208:308a-32: gar bya'o // 'di nyid kyis ni tshogs bsrung zhing //
T02D1208:308a-33: de bzhin dag kyang bsrung ba nyid //
T02D1208:308a-35: 'dis ni sngags kyi bzlas pa nyid //
T02D1208:308a-36: gang du gus bcas glu len dang //
T02D1208:308a-37: gang du gus bcas gar byed pa //
T02D1208:308a-38: tshogs kyi bdag pos sngon byas nas //
T02D1208:308a-39: de la dri ni mtshon par bya //
T02D1208:308a-40: gang du gus bcas glu dang gar //
T02D1208:308a-42: bcas zhes bya ba ni bde ba'o //
T02D1208:308a-43: gus pa zhes bya ba ni bde ba mngon par 'dod pa ste /
T02D1208:308a-44: de nyid bde ba mngon par 'dod pa'o //
T02D1208:308b-0: gang la glu len pa @308b dang ;
T02D1208:308b-1: gar byed pa ni bla ma'i man ngag gis lhan
T02D1208:308b-2: cig skyes pa bskyed pa'i don gyi phyir kun du
T02D1208:308b-3: ru byed pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po'o //
T02D1208:308b-4: tshogs kyi bdag pos sngon byas te /
T02D1208:308b-5: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma'i tshogs te mang po'o //
T02D1208:308b-6: bdag po zhes bya ba ni dpa' bo dpa' mo'i
T02D1208:308b-7: dbang phyug ma de rnams kyi nang du gtso mo
T02D1208:308b-8: dang 'dren pa dang 'khor lo can zhes bya ba'i
T02D1208:308b-9: don to / sngon du byas te zhes bya ba
T02D1208:308b-10: ni sgrub pa po bdag nyid dpal he ru ka'i
T02D1208:308b-11: don to / nga rgyal dang / rig ma bdag
T02D1208:308b-12: med ma'i gzugs kyis rdzogs pa de dang lhan cig
T02D1208:308b-13: snyoms par zhugs pa'i sbyor ba byed pa zhes bya
T02D1208:308b-14: don to / nga rgyal dang / ba'i dngos po'o
T02D1208:308b-15: // de la zhes bya ba ni kun du ru'i
T02D1208:308b-16: snyoms par zhugs pa la mngon par chags pa'i dus
T02D1208:308b-17: don to / nga rgyal dang / ba'i dngos po'o
T02D1208:308b-18: // der ro // dri ni mtshon par bya zhes
T02D1208:308b-19: bya ba ni dga' ba bzhi dang skad cig ma
T02D1208:308b-20: bzhi'i rab tu dbye bas byang chub sems mi zad
T02D1208:308b-21: pa'i rang bzhin de mtshon par bya ste /
T02D1208:308b-22: blta bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1208:308b-23: sgog pa'i dri ni dang po nyid //
T02D1208:308b-24: de nas yang ni bya rgod dri //
T02D1208:308b-25: ga bur ma la ya dza rjes //
T02D1208:308b-26: glu yi byin brlabs mtshan nyid ni //
T02D1208:308b-27: ru ni tam ham sa sya bhra ma ra sya /
T02D1208:308b-28: glu yi mthar ni mnyan par bya //
T02D1208:308b-29: go ma yor gyi sgra dang ni //
T02D1208:308b-30: phyi rol tshal du mtshon par bya //
T02D1208:308b-31: glu yi byin brlabs mtshan nyid do //
T02D1208:308b-32: sgog pa'i dri zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'o //
T02D1208:308b-33: bya rgod kyi dri zhes bya ba ni mchog tu dga' ba'o //
T02D1208:308b-34: ga bur ma la ya dza zhes bya ba ni
T02D1208:308b-35: mchog tu dga' ba mdzes pa las nang du 'khor
T02D1208:308b-36: ba'i byang chub kyi rigs kyi bdag po'i khar thig
T02D1208:308b-37: le'i gzugs kyis bsdus pa gsal bar brjod pa ni
T02D1208:308b-38: kapp'u ra ma ya dza zhes bya ba'i dngos po'o
T02D1208:308b-39: // de rjes su glu yi byin brlabs mtshan nyid do //
T02D1208:308b-40: zhes bya ba ni de'i rjes su ga bur dang
T02D1208:308b-41: ma la ya dza skad cig der glu'i byin brlabs
T02D1208:308b-42: rang rig pa'i byin gyi rlabs lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1208:308b-43: dga' ba brtag pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1208:308b-44: ru tam ham sa sya bhra ma ra sya /
T02D1208:308b-45: glu yi mthar ni mnyam par bya //
T02D1208:309a-0: ha zhes bya ba ni spros @309a * //
T02D1208:309a-1: pa'i byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D1208:309a-2: sa zhes bya ba ni spros pa dang byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1208:309a-3: bde ba yang dag par rig pa tsam mo //
T02D1208:309a-4: bha zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyi bsgom pa'o //
T02D1208:309a-5: ma zhes bya ba ni bdag rig pa'o //
T02D1208:309a-6: ra zhes bya ba ni dga' ba ste /
T02D1208:309a-7: nges bsgrub pa po sdig pa dang bral bar gyur pa'o //
T02D1208:309a-8: ru ta zhes bya ba ni brjod pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po'o //
T02D1208:309a-9: sgra zhes bya ba ni rtog pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po'o //
T02D1208:309a-10: 'di ni ngang ba dang bur ba'i mnyam par bya zhes bya ba'i dngos po'o //
T02D1208:309a-11: go zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1208:309a-12: ma zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'o ;
T02D1208:309a-13: / yo zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
T02D1208:309a-14: ra zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung gnas so //
T02D1208:309a-15: pi zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1208:309a-16: sgra zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po de rnams kyis rtogs pa'o //
T02D1208:309a-17: phyi rol tshal du mtshon bya ba //
T02D1208:309a-18: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems rnam par
T02D1208:309a-19: dga' ba bor ba rig ma'i chu skyes su gnas
T02D1208:309a-20: pa de nyid dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin
T02D1208:309a-21: du bsams te bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1208:309a-22: zos nas bdag nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i gzugs su brtag par bya ba ste /
T02D1208:309a-23: bsgom par bya ba zhes bya ba'i dgos pa'o //
T02D1208:309a-24: sngags kyi rgya mtsho'i pha rol son //
T02D1208:309a-25: grags bzang bsod nams can bzod mdzod //
T02D1208:309a-26: bdag nyid dran pa tsam du ni //
T02D1208:309a-27: ji ltar thob pa bris pa'o //
T02D1208:309a-28: rdo rje'i glu bshad pa zhes bya ba slob dpon sgrol ma can gyi sdes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1208:309a-30: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya dha ra dang /
